body:
Comment 4 by **amit.lavon@mail.huji.ac.il**: 
Found the cause - I had problems with my environment. Here is what happened:
go\bin wasn't in my PATH environment variable, instead I used a go.bat file as a
shortcut. This caused the call system("go tool addr2line") to fail, which is why no
symbols were available. Though I still don't understand why it should fail if executing
`go tool addr2line` from the shell works fine.

I guess you can close it.

Thanks for your help!
